com.bitplan.simplegraph.core

Interface SimpleNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SimpleGraph
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileNode, HtmlNode, JavaASTNode, JavaSourceNode, JsonNode, MapNode, MediaWikiPageNode, PdfNode, RowNode, SheetNode, SimpleNodeImpl, SlideNode, SlideShowNode, SNMPNode, SQLRecord, TripleNode, WikiDataNode, WordNode, WorkBookNode, XmlNode

    public interface SimpleNode
extends SimpleGraph
    The SimpleNode interface represents a Vertex in a graph https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vertex_(graph_theory) it wraps an Apache TinkerPop vertex
    Author:
    wf
